瀩瀩瀩

瀩字的基本解释

瀩
duì
〔澹瀩〕荡漾；亦指荡漾的水波，如“倒影垂瀩瀩。”
〔溏瀩〕冻结，如“冰瀩瀩于井干。”

瀩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duì］
［《正字通》杜貴切］
(1)凝附。
(2)见“澹瀩”。

瀩字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　瀩； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页660第21
【正字通】杜貴切，音隊。水帶沙往來之貌。【夏侯湛詩】水溏瀩于井幹。【廣韻】作濧。【集韻】作?。

瀩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瀩字的起名意思

暂无。

瀩
Basic explanation of words
瀩
duì
〔澹瀩〕Ripple; also refers to rippling water waves, such as "the reflection of the shadow is hanging down."
〔溏瀩〕Freeze, such as "the ice is dry in the well."
瀩
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duì］
["Zhengzitong" Du Guiqie]
(1) Condensation.
(2) See "Dan Ying".
瀩
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　瀩; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 660 21
[Zhengzitong] Du Guiqie, the sound team. The appearance of water with sand. [Xia Hou Zhan Poems] The water drenched in the well. 【Guang Yun】It is beautiful. [Ji Yun] For?.
瀩
